summary: Nokia is a Finnish company that started as a pulp mill in 1865. It grew to become a big player in telecommunications and mobile phones, especially in the late 1990s and early 2000s. Nokia helped develop technology for mobile networks like GSM and 3G. However, after some struggles and a partnership with Microsoft, Nokia sold its mobile phone business in 2014. Now, it focuses on telecommunications infrastructure and new technologies like the Internet of Things. Nokia is still a big patent licensor for mobile phone companies and is one of the largest network equipment makers globally.
title: Nokia
